column5: Not from the area but in laws have a cottage there, looking to get some minnows for fishing. Any places in or around Lindsay?
Kawartha Bait and Tackle right in Lindsay (Queen Street) or Mark's Worm Warehouse just south of Bobcaygeon on #36.  There might be one in Cameron also.
Kawartha Bait and Tackle on Queen St.  S.
Two right in Lindsay and very close to each other.  Kawartha Bait and Tackle and Emm's Sports.
